product_name: SportRack Vista XL Rear Opening Cargo Roof Box
long_description: Load your gear into the SportRack Vista XL Rear Opening Cargo roof box and keep valuable car space free for friends. Rear access keeps you out of traffic when accessing the box. Rack fits round bars, square bars and most factory-installed racks; quick-release hardware mounting makes the roof box easy to attach and remove. Durable ABS constuction; UV resistant; includes locks.
short_description: Load your gear into the SportRack Vista XL Rear Opening Cargo roof box and keep valuable car space free for friends. Rear access keeps you out of traffic when accessing the box.
